name: Blockoverse: The Legend of the Pix
summary: Blockoverse: The Legend of the Pix is an upcoming 2d sidescrolling collect-a-thon platformer. After a group of hammy villains (The Cubies) accidentally unleash an ancient demon named Vertex, a square named Red must harness the powers of 5 archaic spirits, known as the Pix, in order to defeat Vertex. Traverse 5 unique worlds, each sporting their own unique enemies and challenges, on your search to find the 5 Pix, harness their awesome power and bring peace and justice back to the universe.
